name: Arcana Force III - The Empress
text:
When this card is Summoned, toss a coin:
â—? Heads: Each time your opponent Normal Summons or Sets a monster, you can Special Summon 1 "Arcana Force" monster from your hand.
â—? Tails: Each time your opponent Normal Summons or Sets a monster, send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
